name: Research Edge Holdings
description: Operator of an investment research and financial media company intended to offer hedge fund quality research for everyday investors. The company's services include fundamental and industry-specific research, customized research, macro morning calls, company and industry-specific real-time updates, conference calls, corporate access, field trips and virtual portfolio management, enabling clients to get investment ideas through quantitative, bottom-up, and macro analysis with an emphasis on timing.
